disableGravityCrystal.title: Disable Ship Gravity
disableGravityCrystal.tooltip: Disables the gravity crystal inside the ship.

disableEjectButton.title: Disable Eject Button
disableEjectButton.tooltip: Disables the eject button in the cockpit.

disableHeadlights.title: Disable Headlights
disableHeadlights.tooltip: Disables the ship headlights and the landing camera light.

disableLandingCamera.title: Disable Landing Camera
disableLandingCamera.tooltip: Disables the landing camera. Good luck making a proper landing!

disableShipLights.title: Disable Ship Lights
disableShipLights.tooltip: Turns off both the interior and exterior lighting fixtures.
